title: 3 and Out - Brady's "Decision" Drama; Free Agency; Combine Winners; Guest: Chiefs HC Andy Reid Talks SB Comeback, Repeating, Draft
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Brady's "Decision" Drama; Free Agency; Combine Winners; Guest: Chiefs HC Andy Reid Talks SB Comeback, Repeating, Draft
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff thinks Tom Brady not tipping his hand regarding his free agency decision has added anticipation reminiscent of LeBron's "Decision" to join the Heat, warns of the dangers of overpaying in free agency, and looks at the biggest winners from the combine., This week's guest is Super Bowl winning head coach Andy Reid, who looks back at his team's clutch comeback to win his first championship, motivating his troops to repeat, and his approach to this year's draft. He also answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
